verses.roman:
eta saba mane kari' govinda rahilā
prabhu ye puchilā, tāra uttara nā dilā

synonyms: eta saba—all this; mane kari'-thinking; govinda rahilā—Govinda kept silent; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ye—what; puchilā—inquired; tāra—of that; uttara—reply; nā dilā—did not give.
translation: Thinking in this way, Govinda kept silent. He did not reply to the Lord's inquiry.
